TopicTitle: Anybody excited for the Antares Launch today?

Articles.Content:
I sure am! Will be interesting to see how this new rocket flies

http://www.space.com/17933-nasa-television-webcasts-live-space-tv.html

I had forgotten about it, not as much fanfare for this one (and the KSp forums have been down, which means no one reminded me )

Looks like it was postponed until Sunday now, still @ 5PM EDT.

Had also forgot until I glanced at this thread half an hour after scheduled launch time, had a bit of a panic.

Launch might not be on sunday either, the wind situation is predicted to be improved but they're not sure if it'll be improved enough.
Looks like it's going to be third time lucky, probability of scrub from weather is at 20%. Stream already up, albeit without sound.
Looks like everything went perfectly for them. Great success!
